text: Cedric R. Hunter (born January 16, 1965) is a retired American professional basketball player. Born in Omaha, Nebraska, he was a 6'0" (183 cm) 180 lb (82 kg) point guard and played collegiately at the University of Kansas. Hunter was signed as a free agent by the NBA's Charlotte Hornets to a 10-day contract on February 14, 1992,1992 NBA Transactions and played one minute of one game with them in 1991-92, registering no statistics. ==Notes== ==External links== *NBA stats @ basketballreference.com Category:1965 births Category:Living people Category:African-American basketball players Category:American expatriate basketball people in Canada Category:American men's basketball players Category:Basketball players at the 1986 NCAA Men's Division I Final Four Category:Basketball players from Nebraska Category:Charlotte Hornets players Category:Kansas Jayhawks men's basketball players Category:Omaha Racers players Category:Point guards Category:San Diego Wildcards players Category:Santa Barbara Islanders players Category:Sioux Falls Skyforce (CBA) players Category:Sportspeople from Omaha, Nebraska Category:Topeka Sizzlers players Category:Undrafted National Basketball Association players
title: Cedric Hunter
